onbon.y2.play

Class TextAreaTextPage

  • java.lang.Object
    • onbon.y2.play.TextAreaTextPage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TextArea.Page

    public class TextAreaTextPage
extends java.lang.Object
implements TextArea.Page
    The page displays text inside the text area.
    Author:
    ONBON
